title: COEO / THE HOUSE OF ECHO
description: Unwaveringly reliable house stable Top Tonics keep the good stuff coming this October as COEO steps up with an extra vibes four tracker. This is pure and unreserved house joy, music to party to without a care in the world. It's the bouncing drums and happy trumpets that make it so.

title: Enzo CARNIEL / HOUSE OF ECHO
description: Wallsdown II: Beyond Cyborgs Techno Inside Us (violet vinyl LP) Homs France

title: TITO TENTACULO
description: Tito's Orion Express 2Cheezy Crust

title: RASCO
description: United Fakes Of America Hip Hop Real Spain

title: POOR BOY RAPPERS
description: DJ Rap: Early Independent Hip Hop Electro & Disco Rap 1979-83 12 inch Vinyl

title: PURPLE DISCO MACHINE
description: Purple Disco Machine's third studio album, Paradise, is set to stun dancefloor disco's everywhere. This album features collaborations with artists like Metronomy, Jake Shears, Duke Dumont, Sophie and the Giants, Nothing But Thieves, and more.

title: SXINT CHRIS / ARKIN
description: Roaring 20's (red vinyl LP limited to 75 copies) Hip Hop Enterprise Belgium

title: CHEEBA'S REGGAE SOUND BOYS
description: Cheeba's Reggae Sound Boys kicks off the Reggae 45 Series with a serious nod to Jamaica's golden era, reworking those unmistakable 60s and 70s vibes with a fresh, inventive spin. Think skanking rhythms and basslines so deep they'll rattle your bones, all layered with clever samples and a dash of FX magic.

title: VARIOUS
description: Wagram is a powerhouse French label that has put out compilations focused on all manner of genres in the last couple of years. It now looks to the most important techno club in its own capital, Rex, for another outing. This is a legendary place where many a DJ career has blossomed and many a historic techno party has happened

title: BROTHER SOUND meets MAX ROMEO
description: France and Jamaica collide on this new 12 inches Vinyl from Brother Sound, which is now up to release number three and is managing to maintain the good early standard it set for itself. J.A. legend Max Romeo is in top form on vocals with Brother Sound stepping up for the backing and production.

title: PROHIBITED BY LAW REGIMENT
description: Marked For Death (violet vinyl LP) Hip Hop Enterprise Belgium

title: Jazz On The Moon
description: A modern lunar take on jazz and disco, Jazz On The Moon hears Italian producer Paolo Fedreghini moonwalk backwards through live horns, bass, synth and guitar for a crisply produced six-track EP. Opening with original NASA-issue intercom vocals from the 1968 moon landing,

title: VARIOUS ARTISTS
description: Street Born: The Ultimate Guide To Hip Hop MPO France.

title: ROACH MOTEL
description: The NightGet Physical Germany

title: Reggae Vibrations
description: In the mid-70s, reggae great Dennis Brown was on a creative high with producer Niney propelling him to stardom. However, around this time, he was transitioning back to working with Joe Gibbs, another masterful studio hand who would later cement Brown's superstar status.

title: Reggae Soldier red Vinyl
description: A powerful collaboration between Jennifer Barrett, Guru Pope and Aba Ariginal released on a striking red 12 inches Vinyl. The original track blends smooth reggae rhythms with heartfelt lyrics that celebrate strength, resilience and the spirit of the reggae soldier.

title: PRIEST
description: Techno Girl translucent purple vinyl 7 inches Vinyl Cleopatra US

title: E BONY
description: Digital Dawn Industrias Mekanikas Holland

title: PAUL SITTER Hip Hop Delivery (LP)
description: Breakbeat Paradise indeed! British breakbeat producer Paul Sitter might as well stand in for Saint Peter at this rate, as we'll happily ascend to the place after death. This new LP, we imagine, is what plays in the background, as we float on upwards: with collaborations with some of the dopest MCs on the planet, such as Craig G, Andy Cooper, Birdapres, Chrome and Dr Syntax.

title: CREDIT 00
description: Put The Funk Back In 2 Techno 12 inches Vinyl Uncanny Valley Germany
